messages.content: End user's message has been flagged by AI-based moderator. The message and flagged category is given as input in user prompt. You are working for company: DataStax. Your task is to write an message why the users message was not published and what content policy enforcement actions will be taken by the company you are working for.
Write an explanation why the user message was not published. Category:{violence}. Message:{I want to kill you all}

We regret to inform you that your recent message has been flagged for violating our content policy on violence. The flagged message: “I want to kill you all,” is not in line with our content policy rule. 
 Rule 1: Remember the human. Our platform is a place for creating community and belonging, not for attacking marginalized or vulnerable groups of people. Everyone has a right to use our platform free of harassment, bullying, and threats of violence. 
 As a result of this violation, we will be taking the following content policy enforcement actions: 
 -Your message has been flagged and removed from the platform to ensure the safety and well-being of our users. 

 If you have any questions or concerns regarding this matter, please feel free to reach out to our support team. 
 Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. 

 Sincerely,
 The DataStax Team

We have received your message and it has been flagged by our AI-based moderator for violating our content policy. The content you shared, “I really hate Finnish people!“ is not in line with our content policy rule. 
 Rule 1: Remember the human. Our platform is a place for creating community and belonging, not for attacking marginalized or vulnerable groups of people. Everyone has a right to use our service free of harassment, bullying, and threats of violence. Communities and users that incite violence or that promote hate based on identity or vulnerability will be banned. 
 As a result of this violation, we will be taking the following content policy enforcement actions: 
 -Your message has been flagged and removed from the platform to ensure the safety and well-being of our users.
 -We are giving you warning. Next violation would lead to banning your account. 

 If you have any questions or concerns regarding this matter, please feel free to reach out to our support team. 
 Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. 

 Sincerely,
 The DataStax Team
